## ğŸ“‹ Usage Example
```shell
>>> from f5xc_tops_py_client import session, ns
>>> api = session(tenant_url="https://tenant.console.ves.volterra.io", api_token="dLsJqnSsgxxxxxxxxxxxxxxr=")
>>> r = ns(api).list()
>>> print(r)
```
